creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
description: snuff bottle of ivory, etched; glass top in old silver setting
text: Carved from ivory, this bottle was then etched with a rocky, mountainous scene scattered with trees and tiny temples. A river flows in the background. The artist seems to have mimicked the spontaneous style of ink landscapes, using brushstroke-like lines to render the leaves on the trees and the outlines of the mountains.
title: Snuff Bottle
